price: Iyaba twagiraga (amahirwe yo) gusubira ku isi maze ngo tube mu bemeramana.
arabic: فَلَوۡ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةٗ فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: falaw anna lanā karratan fanakūna mina al-mu'minīna
